about_the_game:
We inevitably decided to flower the universe.

Humanity sent probes lightyears away to autonomously terraform and adjust solar systems to expand and reignite the human kind. It began as side-note but turned into a fundamental solution for our desires. For each human and each life-cycle.

We have not expected to hear from the self-replicating systems on their journey.. But a distant signal is requesting manual assistance. It is a conscious decision, is it programmed or is it a bug? Shortly before the first descendants in this unnamed solar system were born and the constructions were completed, everything came to a halt.

Login and connect to a remote service robot and uncover the true straits of civilizations expanding into the universe.

  • OVER NEXT LEVEL COMBAT

Reflections of laser projectiles, orbs and rails. Like a virtual bullet hell you are able to burst out solid 20+ projectiles per second each of them with different attributes, parameters and unique effects. Ricocheting energy bolts blast in 6DOF around corners, along walls and directly into your targets. Master the challenge of independently using your controllers to your advantage. To claim your loot.

  • OVER NEXT LEVEL PROCEDURALITY

A fresh blend of static and procedural environments. Explore orbital stations, cities, facilities and structures and find access points to procedural generated ZONES of different type, length and thematics. Find valuables and ENHANCE yourself to progress further into the technological abyss of a self-advancing autonomous creation. Take too many risks, and lose all traces to your just-found treasures.

  • OVER NEXT LEVEL VR COMFORT

Variable playtime. No tiresome gameplay. No finicky overengineered interactions.

VR, at the current state, can be exhausting and tiring. To counter VR-fatigue the portionised procedural content is manageable and still rewarding. Progress always happens. Either in the story or in your inventory.

  • OVER NEXT LEVEL DEPTH

Zoned is an action game based on SYSTEMS. Upgrade the Main Module of your gun to catapult your damage output. Apply chiplets to manipulate the Company, Edition, Operating Software and Firmware to over 20 Main Modules. Use quantum fluids to work on a quantum scale and unlock even more powerful behaviors of your energy blastings. Spray your body with coating tinctures to add essential resistances to your robotic host. In-depth stat-sheets of everything will leave no parameter a mystery. Find, enhance and combine memories of unlocked procedural areas to reuse them at the memory-combustor in your HUB. And many more.

short_description: A procedural VR-Roguelite. Humanity sent out probes to prepare solar systems for our descendants. A probe calls back requesting manual assistance. Use your headset to remotely plug into a Service Robot at location. Upgrade. Find the malfunction & Save humanity’s Solar Garden of a Civilization.
